name: Doomcaller's Trousers
tooltip:
Doomcaller's TrousersLevel 60

Bring the Skin of the Great Sandworm, 2 Idols of Rebirth, 5 Gold Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Kandrostrasz inside Ahn'Qiraj. You must also attain Friendly reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Skin of the Great Sandworm
- Idol of Rebirth x 2
- Gold Scarab x 5
- Clay Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
